lines.text: Enter MARK ANTONY and SCARUS, with their Army

lines.speaker: mark antony
lines.text: Their preparation is today by sea We please them not by land.

lines.speaker: mark antony
lines.text: I would theyld fight i the fire or i the air Weld fight there too. But this it is our foot Upon the hills adjoining to the city Shall stay with us: order for sea is given They have put forth the haven Where their appointment we may best discover, And look on their endeavour.
